  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99686</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99686</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pollen tube growth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blütenstaubgefäßwachstum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Croissance de tube de pollen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crescimento do tubo do pólen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo del tubo del polline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αύξηση σωλήνων γύρης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crecimiento del tubo del polen</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the second of four illustrations showing a girl investigating the growth of pollen tubes. She placed the pollen grains on a microscope slide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microscope slide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pollen grain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pollen tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist die Sekunde von vier Abbildungen, die 
ein Mädchen zeigen, welches das Wachstum der Blütenstaubgefäße 
nachforscht. Sie plazierte die Blütenstaubkörner auf ein 
Mikroskopplättchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est la seconde de quatre illustrations montrant
une fille étudiant la croissance des tubes de pollen. Elle a 
placé les grains de pollen sur une glissière de microscope.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o segundo de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram uma menina que investiga o crescimento dos tubos do pólen. 
Colocou as grões do pólen em uma corrediça do microscópio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è il secondo di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano una ragazza che studia lo sviluppo dei tubi del polline. 
Ha disposto i grani del polline su uno scorrevole del 
microscopio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η δεύτερη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν ένα κορίτσι που ερευνά την αύξηση των σωλήνων γύρης.
Τοποθέτησε τα σιτάρια γύρης σε μια φωτογραφική διαφάνεια 
μικροσκοπίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el segundo de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran a una muchacha que investiga el crecimiento de los tubos del 
polen. Ella colocó los granos del polen en una diapositiva del 
microscopio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wachstum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikroskopplättchen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blütenstaubkorn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blütenstaubgefäß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">croissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">glissière de microscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grain de pollen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tube de pollen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">crescimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrediça do microscópio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">grão do pólen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σιτάρι γύρης</string>
          </keyword>
